markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Lucky Draw Bandolier](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1211)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 180</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This beige bandolier has a rectangular holster, which allows it to contain a standard-sized [Harrow deck](/Equipment.aspx?ID=824), and red pockets embroidered with goldwork in a strange but appealing mixture of Alkenstar and Varisian motifs.

<document level="2" id="action-991" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Lucky Draw Bandolier
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 180</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Lucky Draw Bandolier (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 180</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate a _greater lucky draw bandolier_ once per hour instead of being able to activate it once per day.
name: Lucky Draw Bandolier (Greater)
